name: HoloBattle Network. Unity Demo. Pet / Trainer Battle / Adventure.
name_original: HoloBattle Network. Unity Demo. Pet / Trainer Battle / Adventure.
description:
Hello to the future Holo Battle Trainers. A demo is here! Please leave a comment if you need help, or add me on Discord, always available to greet and help! ProjectHeroes#4095

Work in progress. Holo Battle Network. Any donations help towards costs.

Support the project and help it grow. Future plans include multi-player co-op. Holo-Battle Network will only be available on Itch.io.

If you make a new game, visit your home and enter the door to begin the tutorial. I have also provided two game saves which begin at the Training area.

Walk up to the Envelope and the quest will show up with instructions. Contact me on here, or Discord should you need further help. ProjectHeroes#4095

Made Using Unity and is for Windows, Mac and Linux. Screen can be resized to fit one screen or stretched to fit a multi-screen set up. The game is also made to run on low spec machines so as many people can enjoy the game as possible. :)

Controls 

  • WASD to move.
  • Left Shift to sprint.
  • Space bar to jump.
  • Middle Mouse Click to switch between mouse modes.
  • Hotkeys 1-4 are used for player and Holo-Summon skills.

Features

  • Explore Homeland and learn how to play Holo Battle Network.
  • Skill Tree system for levelling and points can be re-spent.
  • 3 Holo-Pets which can be leveled up by completing quests.
  • 2 starter saves which begin at the tutorial area. *Home is a temporary move to tutorial if you begin a new game.
  • Platforming abilities which will become much more expanded in new content releases.
  • 2 hours of game-play.

Join DragonBit and many more Holo Pet Monsters on an awesome journey in the games real world and virtual world.  Each Holo Pet  is unique and many are to arrive very soon with new lands to explore and places to visit..  

Holo Battle Network has been in the making for 2 months and is made using Unity. I've been a solo developer for 9 years now. I've really stepped up learning Unity, on top of many other skills to bring a game out for all to play and share in hopes I can keep being a developer for the future. 

What is Holo Battle Network?

Step in to a world much like our own but set much into the future. Augmented reality and Holograms have advanced to  create incredible experiences for the gaming world. Holo Battle Network was created  and became a super popular game due to allowing players to explore their surroundings to catch, battle and compete against Holo Battle Trainers in ways above and beyond the competition. 

With the advance of Hover Tech the world has stepped in to a new era of movement. Jumping, rolling and running is a breeze  with all the coin collecting, questing and stopping off at the vending machine for a quick drink.  You'll find it hard to become tired. :)

HomeStead.

Home area.

The in-game home is the video game area. Begin the tutorial and then begin your journey in AR mode. Battle Holo Pet monsters and take on their quests to improve skills, and abilities through the Holo Talent Tree system and Trainer Talent Tree system.

Battle Trainers

The trainers are ready and waiting to dish out challenges and offer rewards for beating their pets once you're strong enough.

Complete local quests.

Collecting coins and battling for coins to complete goals will also reward the player with newer access modules to VR realms! 

VR realms.

Virtual reality is mind-bendingly superior in the future. Going in to the VR realm offers exploration to Holo Realms where Holo Monsters dwell. 

Holo Battle Network is now around 1-2 hours long and I'm completing the demo for you to come and play. I will only be releasing Holo Battle Network on Itch.io like all of my games. Maybe this one can be enjoyed allot more by the community seeking an experience similar to Pokémon Go and Digimon. 

This is not a bait game. It's a real project. Check out the video and please support. It's surely expensive work and exclusive pets will be redeemable by supporters.

Music.

Holo Battle Network will have some seriously awesome Synthwave music that'll get you excited and possibly keep you up all night.

Future progression to consider.

Holo Battle Network will be a Co-Op / Multi-player game by 2023. I'm panning out the single player and it takes quite allot of work. :O
